thread.section_title: Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing to be back
thread.title_full: Amazing to be back - Review of Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: SsakaM
title: Amazing to be back
text:
Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort really has not changed at all since I last visited more than 6 months back, same great services, well maintained gardens, smiling and welcoming staff.
Really enjoyed my two days stay attending a conference this time.
Also got opportunity to go to the nearby attractive places using a day trip option.
The food was really amazing.
